website_summaries.verdict: The Lenovo IdeaPad 100S-11 is a well-built ultraportable laptop that features a lightweight design, competent performance, and more than 11 hours of battery life, at a very low price.
cons: Average performance on some of our tests

customer_reviews.title: Serviceable entry level laptop
customer_reviews.text: Probably about the best laptop available for the price with this range of features, but far form breathtaking performance and design. Despite the memory size and processor, it is not particularly fast. The placement of the USB and Audio ports are ridiculous, just poorly thought out. The Wi-Fi reception is worse than my old phone and the speaker quality is atrocious. The screen is bright and crisp and the laptop is relatively sleek and light when closed. If you plan on doing a lot of typing you should invest in an external keypad. The keys on this laptop are clunky and actually start to hurt your fingertips after an hour or so constant speed typing.
customer_reviews.author: hungryhippo

customer_reviews.title: OK for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice laptop for the price. Would have been nice with a couple more usb ports. Screen resolution is good with a excellent viewing angle.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Edginton

customer_reviews.title: awsome
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for the price runs well and fast useful laptop for beginners and people who want basic gaming facilities as well as a lightweight laptop. all round flawless
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great disappointment - USB ports on this machine apparently were ...
customer_reviews.text: Great disappointment - USB ports on this machine apparently were not connected to anything, so could not use mouse. Returned and Amazon have refunded - BUT instead of Euros 34 which was the cost of sending back to them, made a payment of £19. NOT quite the refund of the cost of return!
customer_reviews.author: Barbefty

customer_reviews.title: Buy it and you'll regret it.
customer_reviews.text: Only fit for the bin. This laptop is utterly useless, it hangs up for 7 minutes out of every 10 minutes, the Hard Drive is constantly running at 100%. When I need it to respond, it just sits there for minutes on end doing nothing. Avoid it like the plague.
customer_reviews.author: John L

customer_reviews.title: Build quality is very poor compared to a Lenovo laptop from a couple of ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not Buy! Build quality is very poor compared to a Lenovo laptop from a couple of years ago. Screen keeps going blank at random, a known problem if you search the forums, with no obvious fix. A complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Norm the music

customer_reviews.title: I don't understand why yesterday only 2 processors showed up but today device manager shows 4,it appears i owe you an apology,
customer_reviews.text: I like this laptop, very prompt delivery, but I might return it as the write up on specs states it has 4 160ghz processors, but it only has 2 160 ghz processors, and I feel this is way to misleading as I could have bought a cheaper model with the same spec as this actually has, Very annoyed !!!
customer_reviews.author: terence john sanders

customer_reviews.title: Please spend your money elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Awfully slow and has so many system errors constantly. One of the least reliable laptops i've ever used. Comes with so much trash installed which ruins the performance aswell.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: I'm a beginner with laptops but find this pretty easy to use, even to get it up and running was not too much of a problem. Discovered that you can not keep it plugged in to the mains as it just turns itself off after its fully charged, but a full charge does not last that long, so I plug it in while using it unplug when not
customer_reviews.author: j pearman

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy!!!! It's the worst laptop I have ever bought. So slow...takes up to 2 minutes to switch applications and web pages. I purposefully have kept the memory high by not saving documents and programmes to the computer but this has not helped. DO NOT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: James Lowe

customer_reviews.title: I bought this in April 2017. I have had ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in April 2017. I have had nothing but problems with this and cant find how to contact the seller. Lenovo are no help!
customer_reviews.author: Leighanne

customer_reviews.title: A functional good value laptop.
customer_reviews.text: A good value laptop which suits my purpose. It was easy to get going and works well via a wi-fi connection to the internet.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Notebook
customer_reviews.text: Nice and light for a notebook and great because it has a DVD/CD drive which is getting rarer.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs B A Hassell

customer_reviews.title: new lap top
customer_reviews.text: My son reccomended Lenova so when my old one gave up i bought this ideapad nice does everything i need. i use external memory after losing everything on my last laptop teach me to back up files more often
customer_reviews.author: John Johnson

customer_reviews.title: great value, particularly as euro sterling exchange rate was ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this on black friday deal. great value, particularly as euro sterling exchange rate was very favourable. very happy with it. not the strongest build but given its cost, i have absolutely no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for someone who struggles with technology it id good and simple to use
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Super piece of kit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Super piece of kit for the price. Great screen plenty quick enough for me. Only downside is speakers could be better for quality & volume.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C.

customer_reviews.title: he's very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my fiancé, he's very happy with this laptop
customer_reviews.author: rowaina mccormack

customer_reviews.title: OK for southpaws
customer_reviews.text: Why are the USB ports on the left? Only 10% of us are left handed. The remaining 90% have to trail the mouse cable across the front of the computer. Maybe a small thing... but!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. John C. Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Lenovo ideapad 110 Intel Pentium 8gb RAM
customer_reviews.text: Windows 10 update time consuming but Harware is good for the money. Update: screen failed after a few months and the the whole system......
customer_reviews.author: Moi

customer_reviews.title: The casing feels very cheap plastic and the sound volume is poor but for £250 a useful
customer_reviews.text: Decent machine. Does what I need it too. The casing feels very cheap plastic and the sound volume is poor but for £250 a useful PC
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my mother and she still uses it now. Seems to have held up over time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Mother who is in her 70's and needed something cheap and cheerful!
customer_reviews.author: KT Bristol

customer_reviews.title: Not Good.
customer_reviews.text: Sent back. Kept getting system errors.Flimsy build and partial to overheating.
customer_reviews.author: Scunnerd

customer_reviews.title: nice and quick
customer_reviews.text: really good laptop, I bought it for work use but I have also added a few programs such as photoshop and its still nice and quick.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Laird

customer_reviews.title: Too slow!
customer_reviews.text: Would be a good laptop if it wasn't so slow!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fine for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Fine for what it is. Is a bit slow booting up and screen freezes. Have to turn off and start again.
customer_reviews.author: Enjoy

customer_reviews.title: Lenovo Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Bought in Feb 2017, died in July 2018. Cause of death: Internal power failure.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Good battery life
customer_reviews.text: Good battery life, runs at a nice speed, I use it for digital art on the go and it's been trusty
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's great
customer_reviews.text: The laptop is great I will recommend for everyone and it's good for gaming as wall
customer_reviews.author: James fenemer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is so slow it's painful. Have had to buy a faster hard drive ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so slow it's painful. Have had to buy a faster hard drive to speed it up!
customer_reviews.author: steffan jones

customer_reviews.title: works well for me
customer_reviews.text: great laptop does everything i need it to and has great battery life
customer_reviews.author: kim94314

customer_reviews.title: general machine with a good pedigree, I find it fit for my applications ...
customer_reviews.text: The Lenovo ideapad 110 was bought to replace ageing hardware and unsupported op system. I use it for simple on line applications eg email / sms / weather forecasts / general web browsing. I have set it up for off line marine navigation / satelite gps / weather and tide use. I do not live stream or download any data intensive enterainment applications. As a value for money, general machine with a good pedigree, I find it fit for my applications and am pleased with its performance.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Burns

customer_reviews.title: Quite simply a bargain!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant! This is my second Lenovo and I love it, really quick to boot & was already set up for use. A great laptop for home use!
customer_reviews.author: Graham Reece

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this light, easy to use basic laptop, It is exactly what I wanted. If you shop online, use office and Facebook then this laptop is perfect! I'm sure there are many other uses but for me this really is all I need. Great price and very speedy delivery. Within no time of receiving it I was up and running. Love it xx
customer_reviews.author: Ms. J. A. Thebault

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. It's responsive and does exactly what I want it too. When I want it to.
customer_reviews.author: shellholds

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM
customer_reviews.text: Absolute rubbish it lasted a good two weeks though Going back to HP laptops they seem to last for years
customer_reviews.author: Ian Londesbro

customer_reviews.title: The worst laptop I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: The worst laptop I have ever purchased. Mousepad is awful and even after downloading an additional browser it is pitifully slow. It's just not worth buying a low end or cheap spec laptop to run modern Windows, they simply do not work and are not fit for purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Smith

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great entry level laptop with adequate performance and storage (unless you are a very intense user). The price is definately a plus and delivery was very quick. Recommended for anyone who want a good combination of price and performance.
customer_reviews.author: alinspain

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Lap Top, Hoghly Recomendered.... Really fast processor and very user friendly.✨✨✨✨✨
customer_reviews.author: Clive Hawke

customer_reviews.title: good value for money
customer_reviews.text: purchased this for my 87 year old mother .good value for money .mum just has to get used to the all black surround .her old one had a silver surround much better in a lighter surround but never the less after purchasing her a spotlight .made it easier for her to manage. good all round.
customer_reviews.author: dorcas moore

customer_reviews.title: Sound is not the best but who uses the inbuilt laptop speakers
customer_reviews.text: Writing review on the laptop. Working very well and ideal for my needs. Not tried games on it as that is not something I do but for surfing, pictures and videos it works a treat. Sound is not the best but who uses the inbuilt laptop speakers. Add a blue tooth speaker and its great.
customer_reviews.author: moviescot

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad as his first computer. He just wants to browse the web and skype. It does the job for the price. Occasionally it slows down, but it's better than the cheap Asus that I previously bought.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: All good but needed a HDMI to VGA adapter when using ...
customer_reviews.text: All good but needed a HDMI to VGA adapter when using a projector. This uses up one of the two USB ports.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absoloutly Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! You can buy a brick for a cheaper price and still get more use out of it. This laptop is slow and also regularly produces graphical errors on the screen!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really good for a windows based computer it is quick good graphics excellent value
customer_reviews.author: Mr Brian Lunt

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great affordable laptop. Not sure what else to say, I am not techy. It was easy to set up and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: greenfingeredgardener

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with laptop can`t find anything wrong would recommend to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with laptop can`t find anything wrong would recommend to anyone , just the ads they are a real pest when they cut in on you when one is using the laptop , not the laptop`s fault .
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J. Duckett

customer_reviews.title: Amazing price
customer_reviews.text: Bought during Black Friday event so got an amazing price, wanted a larger screen than my previous laptop this is great size it looks good and performs well very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: CELF

customer_reviews.title: mousepad failed after 3 months, required repair but was ...
customer_reviews.text: mousepad failed after 3 months, required repair but was cheap to buy, £ 20 to fix now been working no glitches
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i got this for my son he says he love it
customer_reviews.author: Melon Juicy

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good laptop but required help from lenovo to get it going after 1 week power supply failed another had to be sent from supplier
customer_reviews.author: Philcheck

customer_reviews.title: Lenovouni
customer_reviews.text: Bought for grandson who loves it. He set it up in no time and is really pleased. He has a Lenovo machine without DVD drive so wanted this one as he embarks for uni. tomorrow./ just brilliant, Amazon. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Graham Cunliffe

customer_reviews.title: I just got this laptop and it is really really ...
customer_reviews.text: I just got this laptop and it is really really slow. I applied for return and will buy a new laptop from offline shop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is in a good condition but very slow the children also doesn't like it.
customer_reviews.author: Mathialaky arulappu

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Nowhere near as good as HP or Acer laptops we've had before. Very unreliable with many problems including screen going black, very slow transactions and Internet stopping for no reason, even when right next to router! Would not recommend. Going back to an HP.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Appalling product
customer_reviews.text: This is an appalling product. The number 3 repeatedly and randomly appears when trying to log in. I can not type in my password. This is so fustrating I can not use my laptop. This product should be withdrawn it is so sub standard. Please can I have a full refund as it does not work. If you want it back you can have it but it does not work.
customer_reviews.author: France's

customer_reviews.title: Extremely slow, poor laptop, dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this laptop to do some simple work on using basics like word, power point etc. I returned the laptop as I can safely say it's one of the slowest I've ever used. The CPU was continually hitting 100% making the simplest of tasks impossible. Do not buy this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: Good general purpose laptop
customer_reviews.text: Nice decent quality computer. Not the faster but good general purpose machine
customer_reviews.author: Anthony W.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money, ideal for college work.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift at Christmas for my daughter, replaced her aging laptop. Seem to be extremely good value when compared to other brands. It was definitely the price and user reviews that persuaded me to purchase this model. Arrived very quickly, before estimated delivery date. So far so good. Disappointed that laptops no longer come loaded with certain programmes such as Excel everything these days appears to be an extra. Not the fault of the laptop producer, ...... just the greedy society we live in.
customer_reviews.author: kiltedchico

customer_reviews.title: pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: very pleasantly surprised at how good this machine is. starts quickly. very clear screen. excellent keyboard. battery length reasonable. We wanted it for basic tasks and it fit the bill perfectly. Very good for the price
customer_reviews.author: Sussex chappie

customer_reviews.title: Battery life
customer_reviews.text: It's not a bad laptop at all but the only issue is that it has 2 HOURS battery life which in my opinion isn't that great. Very situational which can be good or bad depending on the reason your buying it. This is also annoying because I wouldn't recommend charging while using as laptops tend to get hot. Everything else is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm 😡 as I paid over £300 for a piece of poo
customer_reviews.text: Updated review. The lag sorted it self out and I was very happy until it updated again and now it partially starts and freezes, it freezes when I'm watching a movie on Netflix or DVD. I've tried to get support help but there's no option unless the screen is broken or the hard drive is burned out. So I'm stuck with a £300 piece of crap!
customer_reviews.author: Falcon

customer_reviews.title: I personally do not recommend buying it
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is very very slow, its frustrating even though it has 8GB of RAM. I personally do not recommend buying it. I want t through it out the window as it takes so long to load, don't be fooled by the price nothing cheap is any good.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: It got worse
customer_reviews.text: Started off well but got worse very quickly. The noise, te battery not lasting 3 hours, when fully charged and turned off, the battery would run out in days even without turning it on. Went to use it again and now the mouse is not working. Thanks to the Amazon Technical team for doing the checks and offering a refund. Will probably get something a little more expensive and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Shah

customer_reviews.title: Ok for kids homework etc. No for gaming!
customer_reviews.text: Laptop is relatively basic, does the job. A little slow. Can't do too much at once but gift for daughter and she's 12 so perfect for her. Useless for gaming though. But school work, internet stuff it's fine! Personally I wouldn't use it, or maybe I'm too used to my MacBook!
customer_reviews.author: Emjay

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Very good laptop for the price nice screen good quality build would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Donfin2

customer_reviews.title: like going back to the 2000's
customer_reviews.text: It is rock solid, big, black, has everything, like going back to the 2000's, even with Pentium processor and DVD, reliable, not too slow for the price (I use Linux, with Windows it must be a pain, since it will have to do many things at the same time for no good a reason; but that is not the computer's fault), and Lenovo. I would buy it again for sure. Maybe even with a better processor.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Jimenez-Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Even with fast internet speed this lap top is dreadfully slow (I'm not the only person to experience this). Dont buy it, mine may take flying lessons soon.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard does not work
customer_reviews.text: For some reason the @ key is not working even with the shift key being held down. Keeps restarting randomly and is slow. Poor product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Even at this price, it was a disappointment, I had expected better from Lenovo
customer_reviews.text: Screen resolution disappointing. Hard drive noisy at times, especially just after start-up. Outer cardboard packaging damaged on delivery but well protected by inner inflated packing. No handbook or even quick start guide but started straight away and user friendly to get started. Manuals on the taskbar. .
customer_reviews.author: D A Grove

customer_reviews.title: Useless!
customer_reviews.text: Worst laptop I have used in my life. It is incredibly slow from the moment I unpacked it. I only wanted to use it for university work so I didn't get a high spec machine but oh god this thing cannot even do that!!! It literally took 10 minutes to start and open google chrome and it's less than 2 months old!!! This is the first and last Lenovo product I am going to buy in my life! The moment I ship this useless item back will be one of the happiest in my life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: Two new laptops and each one had faults from new. Poor checking of the product at the factory.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Bruton

customer_reviews.title: Definitely NOT as described.
customer_reviews.text: This unit is NOT touch screen but relies on speech input instead. It is Windows 10 but is not described as none touch screen. If you access the pc to discover the operation system, Amazon will refuse to exchange. So not as described and a good example of 'sharp practice' in their sales approach. I had purchased two units, but as I opened one, was only able to obtain one refund.
customer_reviews.author: Grimbleboot

customer_reviews.title: Had a lot of trouble since i had this. ...
customer_reviews.text: Had a lot of trouble since i had this. Everytime we use it which isnt often were experiencing problems and its only 3 months. What can we do
customer_reviews.author: Gail O.

customer_reviews.title: Lenovo ideapad
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this, the display is awful, lots of software issues. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: colin gale

customer_reviews.title: Good entry level laptop
customer_reviews.text: Slim with clear screan and superb keyboard. Easy method of getting into bios just need a fine pin, Windows 10 doesn't shut down but goes into a sleep mode sometimes making access to bios difficult. Battery lasts about 3 hours on full brightness. The only thing I miss is a led indicator for the hdd to see drive activity when nothing seems to be going on. For an entry level laptop I recommend this one. I uninstalled the antivirus trial software and Microsoft Office as I use Libreoffice, it is free and every bit as good as MSO (save a bob or two students)
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Barber

customer_reviews.title: Had problems with passwords on Windows 10 and got locked ...
customer_reviews.text: Had problems with passwords on Windows 10 and got locked out. Had to have Windows 19 reloaded. Laptop OK byt software is rubbish.
customer_reviews.author: JG Weston

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Laptop runs at 100% disk and CPU usage from the strain of booting up, any time it should go into sleep mode instead it hard crashes. Machine will often declare on booting there aren't enough resources to log in that profile despite it being the only profile. We are in the process of returning this expensive paperweight, do not purchase these defective machines.
customer_reviews.author: Dunkelzahn

customer_reviews.title: Just Awful!
customer_reviews.text: Have arranged for a return. This is slow at best and does not save files sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Its not working! I could use it only one day! What can I do now??? I need help please!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective laptop
customer_reviews.text: This item is faulty tried to get it repaired with technical support but the person was foreign and did not understand me. I just want to put a new hd in it and cant
customer_reviews.author: Roger Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy indeed with this very inexpensive laptop. It is extremely light and slim and therefore ideal for travelling. I found the keyboard excellent for word processing - probably the best design I have encountered for comfort and accurate typing and it also has a numeric keypad (not often found on cheaper machines) and a light to indicate Caps are on (very thoughtful). It also has the anti-splash feature which I haven't tried yet (!) but which I am sure is effective. 4 Gig of RAM so quite spiffy for the price. Ideal if you are on a budget or want an extra machine to go travelling with.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Great priceand I do like Lenovo as I had bought ...
customer_reviews.text: Great priceand I do like Lenovo as I had bought a refurbished one that weighed a ton some years ago that served me very well indeed. But there are aspects of Windows 10 that I do not like and I will be reverting to good old reliable Windows 7. But a lovely machine for all round use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading processor speed
customer_reviews.text: The processors base frequency is only 1.6GHz not the 2.56GHz as stated in the listing, felt it is misleading. The computer itself is good, light and thin but just feeling disappointed about the way amazon has made the listing.
customer_reviews.author: Sam O'Dell

customer_reviews.title: Found it easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Found it easy to setup. Having a problem with a flickering black screen ,having to restart laptop to clear, has happened every day when used. Thought it might be a problem with windows 10 but when asked in work no one seems to have that problem with windows 10
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: bit slow having problem with windows 10 not the pc
customer_reviews.author: j whittaker-fairs

customer_reviews.title: Its s***
customer_reviews.text: This is s***, Delivery was good its just a s*** laptop
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly and for the price is a great product, i only use it for Excel and ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and for the price is a great product, i only use it for Excel and Word (which it doesn't come with so don't let me mislead you) and general surfing the web while away from home. Would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Lenovo ideapad 110 15.6-Inch Notebook (Black) - (Intel Celeron N3060 1.6 GHz, 4 GB RAM, 500 GB HDD, Windows 10)
product_meta.description:
Lenovo idea pad 110 GREAT PERFORMANCE. GREAT PRICE. The Lenovo idea pad 110 features the latest of Windows, dependable processing power and the safety of Kensington MiniSaver lock at an extremely attractive price, giving you everything you need and nothing you don’t.

BOX CONTAINS
1 x Lenovo ideapad 110, 1 x AC adapter, 1 x User manual,
feature_bullets: Dependable Performance, Powered by the latest Intel Celeron N3060 processor for guaranteed performance.
Incredibly Affordable. Invest wisely in a laptop that won’t stretch your purse.
Kensington MiniSaver Cable Lock Ready. Secure your ideapad 110 with hardened steel.
USB 3.0 Port. Increased USB speed from 480Mbps to "SuperSpeed" 5Gbps
Windows 10 delivers a refined, vastly improved vision for the future of computing.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars181 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
